Metadata.Title: Mask the PAN when It Is Displayed
Metadata.DirectLink: Mask the PAN when It Is Displayed

Content.Data:
Applies to

  • PCI DSS Requirement 3.3

What to Do

Use a symbol, such as "*", to mask all the digits of the PAN except for the last four on any page where the PAN is displayed and the viewer does not have a legitimate business need to see the entire PAN.

Why

PANs are very sensitive and displaying them on the screen or on print-outs is unacceptable.

How

Implement masking in the function(s) used to print the PAN by substituting some character for all the digits in the PAN except the last four.
